attributes.action: Do not add fluoride to drinking water across the UK as proposed.
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is against the proposal to add fluoride to drinking water. 
 "..elevated fluoride intake during early development can result in IQ deficits that may be considerable." (https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC6923889/). "The average loss in IQ was reported as a standardized weighted mean difference of 0.45, which would be approximately equivalent to seven IQ points"https://www.hsph.harvard.edu/news/features/fluoride-childrens-health-grandjean-choi/
attributes.background: The proposal to introduce fluoride into drinking water focuses solely upon caries prevention & dental health, however, multiple peer reviewed studies, including most recently, in 2019 show that fluoride intake directly corresponds to lower IQ scores, especially among developing brains of children.
